articles.content: It appears Google has sold more Chromebooks than Apple has sold MacBooks in 2020. According to a report by Geekwire, quoting IDC, 2020 was the first full year in which Chrome OS took second place bea… [+2008 chars]

articles.title: Three new Motorola phones are now available at Google Fi - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The handsets range from $99 to $279, one of which supports a 5G connection.
articles.content: In a new blog post. Google Product Manager announces that the companys wireless carrier Google Fi will begin offering three new Motorola handsets. All three devices are under $300, one of which suppo… [+1422 chars]
